roleset.name: destroy with a bulldozer

example.name: passive
example.text: ``If Flynn hadn't lived there, the property might have been priced $1 million lower,'' says Mr. Rambo, noting that [Flynn's has been bulldozed [*], and only the swimming pool remains.

roleset.note: BULLDOZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bulldoze' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from bulldoze.01-v predicate notes)
